titles.title: A resolution commending Jeri Thomson for her service to the United States Senate.
A resolution commending Jeri Thomson for her service to the United States Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on March 18, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Commends Jeri Thomson for her extraordinary contributions to the Senate and the country through her service as the 30th Secretary of the Senate.
